title: How to Make a Vanilla Cake in a Mug

text: Mix cake mix, egg, water/milk in a bowl. Whip it for roughly 2 minutes; the colour should change to a lighter yellow, almost white, and have a runny consistency. This will make your cake turn out light and fluffy. Add in the chocolate chips and raspberries.  Pour the mix into a lightly greased mug or ramekin.  Cook in a microwave for 1 minute 45 seconds. While this is cooking, whip together roughly 1/4 cup or less of the packets icing sugar, mixed with a few tablespoons water. Turn the container upside down onto a saucer when your cake is cooked. Top with icing and drizzle with golden syrup while hot. Decorate with raspberries and if you like --- whipped cream.  Finished.
